name: Hydraulic Bandits
description:
Pilot your mech through a post apocalyptic world in this action-packed pixelart platformer. 

Gather resources, upgrade your settlement, and use the guns and mobility upgrades at your disposal to fend off the many hostile inhabitants of the wasteland. 

Beware of scrapper bandits in sand strewn wastes, while mutant abominations await below. Ancient vaults hold the secrets of deadly alien machinery, so be sure to keep your cool.
